sources.title: The Shadow
sources.description: The Shadow - 1933.  This is not the shadow that "knows what evil lurks in the hearts of men;" this shadow is a blackmailer, and the bad guy. It stars Henry Kendall, Elizabeth Allan, and Felix Aylmer.  More information can be found on the IMDB website, if you're into all that.  As for me, I just like watching old movies! The source for this upload can be found elsewhere on archive.org.  I cleaned up the audio and decided to share it back to this site.

sources.title: The Shadow
sources.description: The Shadow knows, and he'll tell unless you fork over a princely sum.

sources.title: The Shadow (1933) CRIME THRILLER
sources.description:
Stars: Henry Kendall, Elizabeth Allan, Felix Aylmer
 Director: George A. Cooper

 A group of people in an old dark house are terrorized by a mysterious hooded figure dressed in black who proceeds to kill them off one by one.

metadata.Plot: A group of people in an old dark house are terrorized by a mysterious hooded figure dressed in black who proceeds to kill them off one by one.
metadata.Writer: Terence Egan, H. Fowler Mear, Gerald Verner
